meanings.sent1: The superhero's incarnated powers made him invincible.
meanings.sent2: The angel appeared in an incarnated form to deliver a message.
meanings.sent3: The incarnated puppy costume at the party was adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was incarnated in every action she took.
meanings.sent5: The artist's incarnated emotions were visible in every brushstroke.

meanings.definition: Manifested or represented in a physical form.
meanings.sent1: The ancient deity was incarnated in a statue at the temple.
meanings.sent2: The spirit of the forest was incarnated in the majestic oak tree.
meanings.sent3: The incarnated smell of fresh cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were incarnated in the form of a successful business.
meanings.sent5: The melody was incarnated in the beautiful notes of the piano.
